attributes.action: Put pressure on the fuel suppliers to pass on wholesale savings at the petrol stations as well as the energy companies.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government is forcing the energy companies to pass on savings to its customers, achieved by the reduction in wholesale oil prices.  Please also force the fuel companies to pass on the savings at the pumps before the country comes to a halt due to people not being able to afford to get to work.
